name: Wanaka Backpackers Bothy
description:
Wanaka Backpackers Bothy is a friendly adventure base in Wanaka offering budget-friendly accommodation to individuals, couples, groups, and families.
We are the perfect base for your stay in Wanaka whether it is for your sunrise Royal Peak hike an action-packed adventure stopover or a laid-back getaway in this beautiful part of New Zealand. You are going to get a laid-back Kiwi experience with Scottish hospitality with the facilities you need to go hard during the day and chill in the evening to get ready for your next adventure. If you want to experience Wanaka and allow a couple of days to really get the feel of the area and the vibe that Wanaka locals love. 
We love your travels and if we have to help you with your touring bike, winter toys, or helping you get to your chosen adventure destination we will go the extra mile for you.
We have a Ski/Snowboard servicing area in the winter as well as a bike maintenance stand and tools (and a handy Ski/Bike mechanic -as for Brooner) if you need to do some maintenance on the go.
The reasons to visit Wanaka are endless just check our website www.bothy.co.nz for ideas and we look forward to making your stay memorable for all the right reasons!

All guests must be over 18 years of age unless accompanied by a parent or guardian (for under 18 years old group bookings please enquire directly).
Late Check-in is strictly by arrangement only. All No-Shows will be canceled and fully charged. 
Valid government-issued photo identification may be required when checking in.
Groups of 3 or more must confirm with the hostel prior to arrival or the booking may be canceled.
All balances owing for your stay must be settled when checking in.
All prices are in NZD and are inclusive of GST.
We reserve the right to change the prices listed for all items listed on our website at any time and without notice. Please check the pricing for your stay on our bookings page or by contacting us.
While we endeavor to accommodate your needs as best as possible for bookings of more than 1 person, we cannot guarantee you will be booked in the same dorm if you use Online travel agents. Contact us directly if you would like to specifically request same-room bookings.

*Deluxe Pods are in mixed Dorms which can have 4 or 6 beds but are more private. Please request the 4-bed dorm if you have a preference. No refund applies if you do not inform in advance about the special request.

groupInformation.terms:
All Group bookings must make contact to discuss the suitability and availability of the room configurations for your group.
We do not accept any commercial group bookings unless pre-arranged.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Bookings cancelled between 14  Days and 7 Days prior to arrival will incur a 50% charge.
Bookings cancelled between 7 days and the day of arrival will be liable for the full charge.
Any change in the booking numbers must be communicated directly with the hostel and may incur cancellation charges.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
All guests are excpected to behave respectfully and mindfull that other guests may require space and peacefulness to enjoy their stay. 
Any members of a group found behaving unnaceptably will be immediatly asked to leave to ensure the other guests enjoy thier stay.
The group may also be asked to leave if in the opinion of the management the booking ws not made in good faith or the beahaviour of members of the group is deemed unnaceptable, illegal or puts other guests at risk from illegal activities inlcudng alcohol consumption in excess,any use of illegal drugs and threatening or aggressive bahaviours.

houseRules.notes:
Cancellations or changes to your booking must be made 48 hours prior to check-in. Failure to do so will incur a cancellation fee which may be the whole booking in some cases.

* Cancellations made throughout the duration of the booking will incur a minimum 1-night cancellation fee or more if during specified times. Please note the full booking will be charged during the Christmas and New Year period with no exceptions.

* The Christmas period has a separate cancellation policy and you must read and understand this when you book. See Bottom of page.

* Failure to check-in prior to 1900 when check-in closes may result in your booking being cancelled and the cancellation policy applied. Please contact us if you intend to arrive late and we can easily arrange this free of charge.

* Any guest under 18 that is unaccompanied by an adult will be unable to stay and will be charged as per the relevant cancellation policy.

* There is an early check-in and late check-out policy that allows you to enjoy the facilities early or later for a small charge. Please arrange this with the hostel manager before check out time 1000 or if you would like to check-in before 1400

*Deluxe Pod in a room of 4 Bed Mixed Dorm are in 4 and 6-bed dorms but are more private. Please request the 4-bed dorm if you have a preference. No refund applies if you do not inform in advance about the special request.
